item.title: Transfer Cache (XFC)
item.description: What is the XFC?   The Transfer Cache (XFC) provides a large area of temporary storage for users of JASMIN to store large files and/or a large volume of files on a short-term basis.

item.title: Using the JASMIN Object Store
item.description: This article describes how to use the JASMIN high-performance object storage. What is object storage?   An object store  is a data storage system that manages data as objects referenced by a globally unique identifier, with attached metadata.
